name: Frigg
description: I will cut off your greed for the forbidden things.

set.set_2: Increase frost ATK by **8%**/**10%**/**12%**/**15%** for **10** seconds when switching between frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.set_4: When unleashing a Frost Domain with the weapon "Balmung," enemies within the Frost Domain receive frost damage equal to **55%**/**65%**/**75%**/**85%** of ATK every second.
